item.title: I-40 East - Exits 432A and 432B
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 432A - US-411 South/Sevierville. Approaching Exit 432B - US-25W/US-70 East/Newport.

item.title: Future I-26 West - Exits 19B-A
item.description: Future I-26 west at Exit 19B - Weaverville. Approaching Exit 19A - US-25/US-70/Marshall.

item.title: Future I-26 West - Exit 19B-A
item.description: Future I-26 West approaching Exit 19B-A - US-25/US-70/Weaverville/Marshall. US-70 west leaves Future I-26 West here.

item.title: Future I-26 West - Exit 21
item.description: Future I-26 West at Exit 21 - New Stock Road

item.title: Future I-26 West - Exit 23
item.description: Future I-26 West at Exit 33 - Woodfin/North Asheville/Merrimon Ave.

item.title: Future I-26 West - Exit 24
item.description: Future I-26 west at Exit 24 - Elk Mountain Road/Woodfin.

item.title: Future I-26 West - Exit 25
item.description: Future I-26 west at Exit 25 - NC-251/University of North Carolina Asheville

item.title: Future I-26/US-19/US-23/US-70 - Hill St. Interchange
item.description: Future I-26/US-19/US-23/US-70 at Hill St. Interchange. Continue on freeway for Weaverville.

item.title: Future I-26/US-23/US-19/US-70 - Asheville
item.description: Future I-26/US-23/US-19/US-70 in Asheville

item.title: I-240 East/US-70 East at Exits 4A and 4B
item.description: I-240 East/US-70 East at Exits 4A and 4B. Exit 4A (Left) - Future I-26 West/US-19/US-23/US-70 West/UNC Asheville/Weaverville/Woodfin. Exit 4B - Patton Ave./Downtown. Continue ahead for I-240 East/US-70 East/ Expressway. I-26 becomes Future I-26 before this intersection because parts of the highway are not up to interstate standards.

item.title: US-70 West/I-25 Junction
item.description: US-70 west to I-25 ramp. Use left lane for I-25 south to El Paso; use right lane for I-25 north to Albuquerque.

item.title: US-70 West at I-25
item.description: US-70 west at I-25 to Albuquerque and El Paso. Continue west on US-70 towards Las Cruces.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching I-25
item.description: US-70 west approaching I-25 to El Paso and Albuquerque. Continue west on US-70 for Las Cruces.

item.title: US-70 West - Roadrunner Parkway IC
item.description: US-70 west at Roadrunner Parkway/Del Rey Blvd. interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Rinconada IC
item.description: US-70 west at Rinconada interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Sonoma Ranch IC
item.description: US-70 west at Sonoma Ranch Blvd. Interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Mesa Grande IC
item.description: US-70 west - Mesa Grande Dr. interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Porter IC
item.description: US-70 west at Porter Drive interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Holman IC
item.description: US-70 west at Holman Road/Dunn Drive interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Weisner IC
item.description: US-70 west at Weisner Road interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Brahman IC
item.description: US-70 west Brahman Road interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - NASA IC
item.description: US-70 west at NASA Road/Baylor Canyon Road interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Entering Lower Rio Grande Watershed
item.description: Entering the Rio Grande Watershed on US-70 west. The Rio Grande flows into the Gulf of Mexico.

item.title: US-70 West - Missile Range IC
item.description: US-70 west at Missile Range Headquarters/HTA interchange.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching White Sands IC
item.description: US-70 west approaching White Sands Missile Range interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Bataan Memorial Highway
item.description: US-70 west - Bataan Memorial Highway. US-70 between Las Cruces and Alamogordo is designated as the Bataan Memorial Highway.

item.title: US-70 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-70 west. Distance to White Sands Missile Range and Las Cruces.

item.title: US-70 West - Holloman AFB Main Gate IC
item.description: US-70 west approaching Holloman AFB Main Gate interchange. US-70 continues west towards Las Cruces.

item.title: US-70 West - Holloman AFB IC
item.description: US-70 west approaching Holloman AFB Main Gate interchange. US-70 continues west towards Las Cruces.

item.title: US-70 West - White Sands Missile Range Warning
item.description: Warning on US-70 west leaving Alamogordo: When flashing US-70 closed ahead. Expect one hour delay.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South at Split
item.description: US-70 West/US-54 South at US-70/US-54 split.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South at US-70 West
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West (Relief Route) at US-70 West exit to Las Cruces.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West - US-70/US-54 Split
item.description: US-70/US-54 Split on US-70 West/US-54 South (Alamogordo Relief Route). Use left lanes for US-54 south to El Paso.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South - Relief Route
item.description: US-70 West/US-54 South - Alamogordo Relief Route.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West at US-82 and Relief Route
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West at US-82 and Alamogordo Relief Route. Turn left for US-82 east to Cloudcroft. Turn right to continue on US-54 South/US-70 West to Las Cruces and El Paso (Alamogordo Relief Route). Continue straight for White Sands Blvd. and downtown Alamogordo. This is the western end of US-82.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West Approaching US-82
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West approaching US-82 and Alamogordo Relief Route junction.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West - NM-545 Jct.
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West at NM-545 to La Luz.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-70 West/US-54 South in Tularosa. Distance to Alamogordo, Las Cruces, and El Paso.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching US-54
item.description: US-70 west approaching US-54 in Tularosa. US-70 joins US-54 south to Alamogordo.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching US-54
item.description: US-70 west approaching US-54 junction in Tularosa. Merge to continue on US-54/US-70; merge right for US-54 north.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching NM-244
item.description: US-70 west approaching NM-244 junction.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 24
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 24 - BL-10/US-70/East Motel Drive.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 135
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 135 - US-70 East/W. Picacho Ave.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 135
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 135 - US-70 East/W. Picacho Ave. US-70 joins I-10 westbound to Lordsburg.

item.title: US-380 East at Main St.
item.description: US-380 east at Main St. Turn right for Main St. south to US-285/Artesia; turn left for Main St. to US-285/Vaughn. Continue east for US-380 to Tatum.

item.title: US-380 West at Main St.
item.description: US-380 west at Main St. Turn right for Main St. (to US-285 North) to Vaughn. Turn left for Main St. (to US-285 South) to Artesia. Continue west for US-380 (to US-70) to Ruidoso.

item.title: Main St. North at US-380
item.description: Main St. North at US-380. Turn right on US-380 east for Tatum, left on US-380 west (to US-70 west) for Ruidoso. Continue north on Main St. for US-285 north to Vaughn.

item.title: Main St. North at US-380
item.description: Main St. North at US-380 junction. US-70 used to run along US-380 and Main St. before the Relief Route was completed.

item.title: Main St. North at US-380
item.description: Main St. North at US-380 junction. US-70 used to run along US-380 through Roswell until the Roswell Relief Route was completed. Main St. was the former route of US-285, although there are still US-285 markers along Main St.

item.title: US-285 North - Roswell Relief Route
item.description: US-285 north at the southern end of the Roswell Relief Route. For US-285 North, US-380 West, and US-70, this is the truck route around the city. Officially, US-285 runs along the relief route, although there are US-285 markers along the old segment through Roswell.

item.title: White Sands Blvd. North at US-54/US-70/US-82
item.description: White Sands Blvd. north at US-54/US-70/US-82 junction. Turn right for US-82 east; left for US-54 South/US-70 West; straight for US-54 North/US-70 East.

item.title: White Sands Blvd. North at US-54/US-70/US-82
item.description: White Sands Blvd. North at US-54/US-70/US-82 in Alamogordo. Turn left for US-54 South/US-70 West/Relief Route/Las Cruces/El Paso. Turn right for US-82/Cloudcroft. Continue straight for US-54 North/US-70 East/Tularosa. This is the northern end of the Alamogordo Relief Route. This is also the western terminus of US-82.

item.title: US-70 East at Alamogordo Relief Route
item.description: US-70 east at Alamogordo Relief Route. Exit here for US-70 East/US-54 North/Relief Route/Tularosa. Continue straight for downtown Alamogordo via White Sands Blvd. White Sands Blvd. rejoins US-54/US-70 on the north end of Alamogordo.

item.title: US-54 North at US-70
item.description: US-54 north at US-70 west, the southern end of the Alamogordo Relief Route. Turn right for US-54 North/US-70 East/Relief Route/Tularosa. Continue north for US-70 west, and downtown Alamogordo.

item.title: US-54 North at US-70 - Alamogordo Relief Route
item.description: US-54 north at US-70. Turn right to access US-82/Cloudcroft (via Alamogordo Relief Route).

item.title: US-54 North Approaching US-70
item.description: US-54 north approaching US-70 at the southern end of the Alamogordo Relief Route.

item.title: US-54 North Approaching US-70
item.description: US-54 north approaching US-70 in Alamogordo. Use US-70 west for Las Cruces. Use US-54 north for Alamogordo and Tularosa. US-70 joins US-54 north to Tularosa.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at US-70
item.description: US-60 west/AZ-77 south at US-70. Turn left for US-70 and to continue south on AZ-77. Turn right to continue west on US-60.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching US-70
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South approaching US-70. Use US-60 west for Globe and Phoenix. Use US-70 west/AZ-77 south for Tucson (via AZ-77) and Safford (via US-70). This is the western end of US-70.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching US-70
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 south approaching US-70. This is the western end of US-70.

item.title: End US-70 West at US-60 and AZ-77
item.description: End US-70 west at US-60 and AZ-77. AZ-77 turns north here onto US-60 east.

item.title: End US-70
item.description: End US-70 approaching US-60/AZ-77 Jct.

item.title: US-70 West/AZ-77 North at US-60/AZ-77
item.description: US-70 west at US-60/AZ-77 junction. Use US-60 East/AZ-77 North for Show Low and Springerville. Use US-60 west for Globe and Phoenix. This is the western end of US-70.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching US-60
item.description: US-70 west approaching US-60. AZ-77 north has been following US-70 west, and turns onto US-60 east. This is the western terminus of US-70.

item.title: US-70 West at AZ-77
item.description: US-70 west at AZ-77. AZ-77 joins US-70 west into Globe.

item.title: US-70 West at AZ-77
item.description: US-70 west at AZ-77. Use AZ-77 south for Winkelman and Tucson. Continue west on US-70/AZ-77 north for Globe.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching AZ-77
item.description: US-70 west approaching AZ-77

item.title: US-70 West Approaching BIA-8
item.description: US-70 West approaching BIA-8.

item.title: US-70 West at US-191 South
item.description: US-70 west at US-191 south. Use US-70 west for Globe and Phoenix. Use US-70 East/US-191 North for Lordsburg (NM).

item.title: US-70 West at US-191 South
item.description: US-70 west at US-191 south. Use US-70 west for Globe and Phoenix. Use US-191 South for Willcox.

item.title: US-70 West/US-191 South at US-70/US-191 Split
item.description: US-70 West/US-191 South at the US-70/US-191 Split. Turn left to continue south on US-191. US-70 continues straight ahead.

item.title: US-70 West/US-191 South Approaching US-191
item.description: US-70 West/US-191 South Approaching US-191/US-70 split.

item.title: US-191 South at US-70
item.description: US-191 south at US-70. US-191 South joins US-70 west to Safford.

item.title: US-191 South Approaching US-70
item.description: US-191 south approaching US-70. Use US-70 West/US-191 South for Safford and Phoenix. Use US-70 east for Lordsburg (NM).

item.title: US-191 South Approaching US-70
item.description: US-191 south approaching US-70.

item.title: US-70 West/NM-90 East at Split
item.description: US-70 West/NM-90 East at US-70/NM-90 split. Use US-70 west for Duncan(AZ) and Globe(AZ). Use NM-90 for Silver City.

item.title: US-70 West/NM-90 East Approaching Split
item.description: US-70 West/NM-East approaching US-70/NM-90 Split.

item.title: US-70 West/NM-90 East
item.description: US-70 West/NM-90 east in Lordsburg.

item.title: BL-10 East at US-70/NM-90
item.description: BL-10 east at US-70/NM-90 to Duncan (AZ) and Silver City.

item.title: NM-494 North at US-70/BL-10/NM-90
item.description: NM-494 north at US-70/BL-10/NM-90. US-70/NM-90 split off BL-10 here towards Silver City.

item.title: NM-494 North at BL-10/US-70/NM-90
item.description: NM-494 north at BL-10/US-70 and NM-90.

item.title: NM-494 North Approaching BL-10/US-70
item.description: NM-494 north approaching BL-10 and US-70.

item.title: NM-494 North To US-70/NM-90
item.description: NM-494 north to US-70/NM-90 in Lordsburg.

item.title: I-10 East at Exit 22 Offramp
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 22 offramp at NM-494 junction. Use NM-494 north for BL-10/US-70/NM-90.
